rules.ruleString: For commencement date before `01-JAN-2014` Do true Otherwise Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ATS3096}

unitName: On the brink of modernity (Germany and Europe 1890-1920)
description: This unit will examine Austrian and German literature at the turn of the century and will focus on the intellectual life of the urban centres, cultural criticism, the nascent youth movement and new conceptualizations of corporality and the workings of the psyche.
